section.name: Create hadoop jar
section.p: This command allow to create a jar file that contains all the plugins and dependencies needed to run your analysis in distributed mode. The generated jar name is like eoulsan-@@@VERSION@@@-a19e9799.jar. Use this command before running manualy Eoulsan on a Hadoop local cluster or on AWS MapReduce.

section.name: Run manualy Eoulsan in Hadoop mode
section.p: With the jar file generated you can manualy launch Eoulsan with a Hadoop command:
section.source: $ hadoop jar eoulsan-@@@VERSION@@@-a19e9799.jar execjarhadoop hdfs://toto.example.com/test/param.xml hdfs://toto.example.com/test/design.txt hdfs://toto.example.com/test
